"Hind legs first." she said with a smile, adding, ", and don't get them mixed up with the forelegs, you don't want to end up with a horse's ass for a head."

He has to half-stand, to wiggle the bulky suit over his own hips.

With that in place he slumps back onto the sofa, and tries to wiggle his toes. There's no response from them, and the hoof just sits there immobile.

"Come on... half-way there." Jakki adds with a smile. She kneels on the floor, working her hands over his legs, smoothing out wrinkles in the skin.

Tim groans at the touch, and with embarrassment covers it up ruffling the top half as he slides his arms into the forelegs of the skin. As he does, the neck and head of the skin flail about slapping him across the face a couple of times.

Once his arms are in place he notices the gap for his head, it only goes about half-way up the horse's neck. But his arms also don't reach the full length of his forelegs.

He feels Jakki sit down on the sofa beside him, automatically turning his head. But inside the skin he can't see anything.

"Are you ready for the final stage?"

"Yes..." he summons up the words, half-hoping that they'll be muted by the skin.

However, he feels Jakki's hands work their way up his spine... from tail to mane ....

It's a ticklish sensation, but he feels the suit begin to shift from being a costume to become his new skin.

"Just nod you head four times, when you're ready to return."

He tries to answer, not sure whether to simply say yes, or crack a joke. But the magic is too far along, and a whinny is all that comes out.

As he feels the magic progress, he stumbles forward off the sofa, and balances on all fours in the middle of the room.

It's like a drug trip as he watches Jakki recede. It takes him a moment to realise it is him that is growing. Soon he towers over her, and with a roll of his equine neck, he discovers he has full mobility. Tentatively he lifts one leg at a time as he experiments. It all feels so natural, he was glad not to be stuck splay-legged like a new-born foal.

With a flick of his tail, he let out a braying whinny of joy. Jakki was backing away. In the room there was barely enough room for him to turn, let alone take more than a pace or two.

It was bitterly disappointing, to have these powerful muscles and build, and not be able to express it... not be able to run freely.

"Wow... you really filly that suit out beautifully."

Tim's head raised and he gave a single nod. He was relieved to still be able to understand human speech. Cautiously she approached and ran a hand down his spine. His skin twitched at her touch, nervousness he assumed.

It had to be the influence of the suit, he thought suddenly. He felt around the base of his neck, trying to find the catch that would reveal the zipper. When his fumbling fingers couldn’t find anything he became slightly concerned, but not too worried. He remembered his mothers parting words with a grimace. Guess I’m going to have to read that manual after all, he thought, and picked the thick manual up off the floor where it had fallen.

The manual was titled ‘BODYSUIT’ Models 4010 through 7500 Inclusive, and was very thick, filled with page after page of large friendly text that seemed to deal mainly with how wonderful an opportunity to explore life from a new perspective the purchaser now had ahead of them. It even said so in the opening paragraph.

Body Suits are used by Doctors, Nurses, Teachers, and other professionals in hospitals, law enforcement, educational institutions, private care facilities, and various government agencies around the world as training tools to teach empathy, understanding, and compassion. BodySuits.com strives to offer the best in Body Suit technology. Whether you have purchased this suit yourself or someone has purchased it for you, you have received the wonderful gift of the opportunity to explore a life from the new perspective now ahead of you. Our suits allow the user the freedom to experience life form a perspective would otherwise only dream about. As well as individual users…

The introduction went on and on, extolling the virtues and uses of Body Suits. But gushing poetic about their customer base wasn’t helping Tim figure out how to remove the suit, so he skimmed the pages towards the back until he found a trouble shooting guide.

The guide itself wasn’t that long (guess there’s not a lot that goes wrong with these suits, Tim thought) and running his finger down the page he quickly found a heading that exactly what he was after.

Cannot release Zipper:
The zipper release feels like a small hard lump and is found at the top of the spine just above the C3 Vertebrae at the base of the skull. Press the zipper release firmly for three seconds, release, then press again firmly for five seconds. All suit functions will stop and the suit’s zipper will now be revealed. Once the zipper has been revealed the zipper may be pulled downward to open the suit and allow the wearer to exit. If the Zipper release fails to reveal the zipper, check for the following:

Has Zip-B-Gone been applied to the suit? (models 4200 and up)
Zip-B-Gone is a spray product applied to the zipper release to further conceal the zipper and reduce the possibility of accidental exposure of the suited individual’s nature to other parties at times when such revelation could prove inconvenient. Apply Zip-Re-Store (available separately) to the zipper release area to return the zipper release to normal function.

Has the suit been recently applied? (models 4900 and up)
The first time you wear your new BodySuit the initial synchronization can result in sensations that are very intense and in some cases quite traumatic to the individual. The enhanced nature of the Nanorobotic Cellular Reconstruction Domain Dynamic and our specialty patented Neuro-net require a minimum of 72 hour to properly interface with the user’s nervous system. Premature interruption of this process can damage the suit, and in rare instances, the users own nervous system. As a precaution the suit release is unavailable until the synchronization process is complete. Once properly interfaced the suit can be donned and removed at any time and as many times as the user would like without the traumatic sensations that usually accompany the initial wearing of the suit.

Tim wasn’t sure what model number he had, so he dug around until he found the packing slip for the suit. Sure enough, it was a FirTri-7000. And he had put it on less than an hour ago, which meant that the synchronization was still running and would be for another 71 hours. Tim did the math in his head, not realizing how surprisingly easy he now found it to do now. 71 hours was an hour short of three days. He was stuck in the suit until Sunday afternoon.
121332222212211221.title: Tim actually reads the manual.

choices: Mom comes running to see what the problem is.
Mom has left, Tim is on his own.
Someone comes in, but it isn't mom.
1213322222122112211.content:
Next Chapter
Tim reads further:

Reading further down the list, Tim spotted some more references to the specific model of suit he was wearing.

Is the suit one of the Trimester Models (FirTri, SecTri, ThiTri, or FulTer only)?

FirTri, see section 5,1
SecTri, see section 5,7
ThiTri, see section 5,13
FulTer, see section 5,15

Maybe he wasn’t stuck until Sunday, he suddenly thought. If the FirTri model had a section all to itself, maybe there was something in that section about releasing the zipper early. Not that he was in a panic to get out of the suit. He was actually starting to feel quite comfortable and relaxed. And it had been sort of liberating when he had realized he had an excuse the keep the suit on.
Still, Tim would have felt foolish if it turned out he’d kept the suit on for the full 72 hours, only to find there had been a quick release sequence he could have used. He quickly found the relevant section and continued reading.

Section 5,0:
Trimester Models (FirTri, SecTri, ThiTri, FulTer) Series 4900 to 7000

Many couples and individuals desire to experience the wonders of pregnancy, but are unable to do so. Perhaps you have worked hard for a career goal that would need to be put on hold while pregnant. Or maybe you aspire to political office. Maybe your cultural or social background is preventing you from experiencing the joy of motherhood. Perhaps you or your significant other are suffering from a medical condition or physical handicap which would otherwise prevent pregnancy. No matter what the situation, BodySuits.com is here to help.

Section 5,1: FirTri (First Trimester) series 5700 to 7000
FirTri suits, short for First Trimester suits, are specifically designed to allow a person to experience the wonder of pregnancy from the moment most women discover they are pregnant. While the Neuro-net has been synchronizing with the wearer’s nervous system, specialty Nanorobotics found only in BodySuits FirTri models have been harvesting DNA from their body and combining it with the BodySuit.com FirTri model donor (or other custom donor if using the FirTri Custom Donor Selection option, series 6000 and up only). This combined DNA has then been used to assemble a 6 week old fetus implanted into the womb of the bodysuit, allowing the resulting child to truly be a combination of both the wearer and the donor.

Your 6 week old fetus is about the size of a pea. At the moment he or she is curled in a c shape around the remains of the yoke sack that has been feeding it until now. He or she has started to develop limbs, as well as ears, eyes, and other recognizable facial features. Your baby also has a heart beat that is detectable with sensitive instruments.

Special note: As any action that would stop the suit from functioning would also result in the loss of function for the unborn baby, the zipper reveal function will be disabled until after the baby is brought to term.

Tim stopped and read that last part a second time, trying to understand what bring the baby to term meant? And if the zipper reveal function was disabled, how was he supposed to get out of the suit? Then his heart fell and he dropped the manual in shock. For a minute he could only sit there as the implications sank in.

Then he did the only thing he could think of to do.

“Moooom!!!” he cried out as he burst into tears.
1213322222122112211.title: Tim reads further down the list.

choices: Tim freaked out and tried to rip the skin off.
Tim is face down on the bed crying.
There is someone knocking on the back door.
12133222221221122111.content:
After Tim had gone upstairs, Janet had picked up her phone and dialed her husband. She’d promised to regularly update him, and this would be quite the message to leave on his voice mail. To her surprise, he answered on the third ring.

“Hey Honey,” her husband said over the background noise of the terminal. “I wasn’t expecting you to call.”

“Well I wasn’t expecting you to pick up. I was going to leave you a message. I thought you would be on the plane already.”

“Some mechanical problem with another plane at our gate so we have to wait until they can clear another. We haven’t even begun boarding yet. What’s up?”

“Guess who was home when I got here.”

“What is he doing home so early? He should be in school.”

“Yeah, well apparently he got suspended.”

“What for? Don’t tell me it was the fight at lunch.”

“No. He got a week suspension for illegal use of the school computers to spread hate propaganda.”

“That crap again? We have to do something about him and computers. I can’t have him posting that crap online. If it gets back to my boss what my son is doing it could seriously jeopardize my career.”

“Well he's banned from using the school computers now. I'm thinking I may try that at home again, not that it worked last time. But I have something else in mind that might work. Guess who also found his package.”

“No kidding. Did you manage to convince him to put it on?”

“Even better. Get this, he was already wearing it when I got home.”

“Seriously?” She heard her husband laugh into the phone. “I would have thought once he read the manual he would have burned the suit instead.”

“What makes you think our son would take the time to read the manual? You saw how thick it was. We can barely get him to read the menu at IHOP.”

“Yeah, you got that right. If it doesn’t have pictures or expresses an opinion he can sarcastic reply to, he doesn’t bother.” There was a momentary pause. “So what does he look like?”

“She is as gorgeous as she was in the pictures I showed you last night. And polite as well. You know she actually asked to be excused from the table?”

“No! Seriously?”

“Seriously. Of course I left the RealSelf device setting for submissiveness set to maximum, so that might have had something to do with it. Still it was a nice change. I just may leave it like that permanently.”

There was a pause before her husband spoke again. “I would like something left of my son you know. He wasn’t all bad.” he said finally.

“I know, I know. He was my son too you know. I plan on tweaking the settings a bit as we go, just enough to get back some of the old Tim back out. The parts we want, at any rate. Speaking of which, her name is now Crystal.”

“Crystal?”

“Yep. Crystal MacArthur. The BodySuit place included a packet of identity papers with the order. I’m not sure if they are good enough to get a passport, but they should do for day to day life.”

“Did they provide some background? Who she is or where she was born?”

“Oh no, the papers just give her name and date of birth. The rest of it I’m making up as we go along. Speaking of which, I think that if anyone asks, we should say we sent Tim upstate to a military boarding academy to straighten him out. As for Crystal we can explain that we know Tim is the father and that Crystal’s parents kicked her out of the house for getting pregnant and she’s staying with us until after the baby is born.”

“Okay, but make it a navy boarding school. I’ve always wanted to tell people my son is in the navy. That’ll make a man out of him”

Janet laughed “Too late for that I’m afraid. But sure, what the heck.” Just then she heard Tim’s plaintive cry from upstairs. “Oops, gotta go.” She said “Sounds like someone got around to reading the manual after all. Call me later when you get settled into your hotel room and I’ll fill you in.”
12133222221221122111.title: Mom comes in to see what the problem is.

121332222212211221112.content:
Tim was lying in the middle of the bed, bawling his, or rather her eyes out. Seeing him like that, even though she knew it was entirely his own fault, Janet still felt a tug at her heart. No parent truly enjoys seeing their child upset, even when it is entirely a result of their own actions. Quickly she sat down beside the young man turned girl and gathered her into her arms, rocking her comfortingly.

“Honey?” Janet asked, as if she didn’t know. “What’s wrong?”

“Mom,” the girl gasped out between sobs “I, I, I t-tried to t-t-take the suit off, only I couldn’t make the zipper appear and when I looked up why it told me to read section five and section five says that the zipper won’t appear until after the baby is born and…” the girl took a deep breath and wailed “Oh mom, I’m pregnant!”

Janet managed to look suitably shocked, even though she had known exactly what was going on. Unlike her son, she and her husband had read the manual when they opened the box and knew exactly what would happen. Still, her plan dictated that she play the shocked mother, so she hugged her son, new daughter and tried her best to sound supporting.

“Oh honey. Are you sure?”

The girl nodded her tear streaked face. “FirTri.” She sobbed “First Trimester. The suit makes you pregnant and then you can’t take it off. I’m trapped!” The girl burst into a fresh set of tears “Oh mom! It wasn’t supposed to be like this. It was just supposed to be stupid Halloween costume. I can’t be pregnant. I just can’t!”

“There, there, now.” Janet said, holding her son new daughter close and rocking her comfortingly. “Everything is going to be alright. No matter what happens, I am here for you.” Janet meant that. In spite of the reasons how she got like this or why, her son new daughter was going to need her now more than ever, and she found that her own maternal instincts were kicking in. She actually felt sorry for what the girl was going through.

After a while the girl seemed to have cried herself out and lifted her tear stained face. “Mom? She asked quietly.”

“Yes dear?” Janet answered. Where the girl's face had been pressing against her blouse was soaked with tears

"What am I going to do?”

“We’ll figure that out as we go honey. It might surprise you to learn this, but you’re not the first girl to find herself in this situation.” Janet gave the girl another hug. “It’ll be alright. I promise.”

Tim looked up at her, the remnants of tears still glistening in the corners of her eyes. “Do you really think so?”

“Of course honey,” Janet replied. “Whatever happens, I’m here for you.”

This time it was Tim that gave her the hug. “Thanks mom.”

“No problem kiddo.” After a long moment, when Tim finally started to untangled herself, she said. “Let’s get you dressed and we’ll see about getting something to eat. And I think you should wash your face.”

“Yeah, I guess I should.” Tim replied, feeling the dry crust of tears on her cheeks. She got up and headed for the bathroom. As she approached the door she hesitated, then turned back for a moment. “I love you mom.” She said, before turning and entering the bathroom.

“I love you too, sweetheart.” A shocked Janet said automatically to the girl’s retreating back. It had been years since she’d heard those words. Will wonders never cease, she thought. This just might be worth it after all.
121332222212211221112.title: Tim is face down on the bed crying.

choices: Crystal decides to wear a skirt,
1213322222122112211122.content:
Tim stared at the girl in the mirror for a long time. The skin of her cheeks were still flushed and slightly red from where she had scrubbed the tears away, but even with puffy eyes and her hair disheveled she was still beautiful. She studied the face for a long time, trying to come to terms with the thought that this is what she was going to look like for the foreseeable future. Without thinking about it she picked up her mother’s brush off the counter and began to straighten her hair.

The movements of her arms caused the loosely tied robe to fall open, exposing her perfectly shaped 34C breasts which swayed hypnotically as she brushed. 24 hours earlier such a sight would have had Tim drooling and unable to look at anything else, unable to think of anything but how to get his hands on them. Now, although she did take the time to cup them in her hands and marve once more at the way they felt as she lifted them up, the thrill was dampened as her mind processed the fact that they were now hers to look at any time she wanted for the next 9 months. With a sigh she let them go and returned to dealing with her hair.

Once her hair was back under control she replaced the brush in the holder where it belonged, wondering momentarily just why that small action had seemed so important at the moment. Then she retied the robe and headed back to Tim’s bedroom.

Her mom had opened the other boxes and was laying out the enclosed clothing on the bed. Two pairs of simple blue panties, a matching bra, pink ankle socks, a pair of skinny legged jeans, and a V-necked T-shirt.

“We’ll have to go shopping,” mom said as she cleared away the boxes and packaging material. “These will do until tomorrow, but we’ll need to pick you up a whole new wardrobe.”

“But I have lots of clothes!” she protested, gesturing at the pile in front of the closet.

“Tim had lots of clothes, mostly t-shirts and jeans. You’ll need more than that. None of those will fit you anymore. And you really don’t want to wear his underwear, do you?”

Tim shook her head. Mom had said 'want' instead of 'can't' and deep down she agreed with her. For some reason the very thought of wearing the old Tim’s underwear was repugnant.

“Which reminds me.” Mom said as she stacked the now empty boxes inside each other and folded them closed. “Your new name is Crystal MacArthur.”

“Crystal? What kind of name is that?” Even as she spoke Tim Crystal felt something shift in her mind. It was a subtle feeling. And suddenly the name felt perfect to her.

She rolled it around her mind “Crystal MacArthur” she said. “I like it.”

“That’s good, because all of your ID came with that name on it.”

“I have ID?”

“It was part of the package.” Mom said, gesturing to the box on the bed. “Now we need to get you dressed and start dinner.” She said, handing Crystal a pair of the panties. “I’ll fill you in as we go.”

Crystal looked at her mother, expecting her to leave. Instead she just smiled and said “I'll stick around for a minute, in case you need some help."

"They're only clothes mom. Can I get a little privacy here?"

"I’ve already seen you naked, sweetheart, remember? Besides, it’s not like you have anything I haven’t.”

Crystal blushed. While that was true, for some reason she still felt uncomfortable getting dressed with someone else in the room. Taking the panties, she compromised by turning her back on her mom before letting the robe fall open. It took her a second to realize there was a little bow that marked the front instead of a Y gap, but once she'd figured that out she quick stepped into them and pulled them up. The feeling was totally different than her old underwear, the silky smooth material felt good sliding up her hairless legs, and rested comfortably on her hips. The cotton panel of the crotch cupped the space snugly between her legs without pinching or squashing anything.

Putting the bra on was a different matter. After shedding the robe, Crystal slipped her arms through the straps and brought them up over her shoulders, then fumbled around trying to get the hooks to clip together in the back. Her hands bent the wrong way and kept getting tangled in her hair. She also kept losing her grip. Her mother watched her awkward fumbling with amusement for a minute before taking stepping in and showing her how it was done.

“I don’t know why everyone thinks you need to try and flex like a circus performer,” Janet said. “It’s far simpler to clip it around your waist like this. Don’t forget is should be upside down and inside out. See? Clip it over your belly where you can see, spin it around, put your arms through the straps, and pull the straps up. Lean forward and shake your shoulders to settle your boobs into the cups, then pull the straps over your shoulders and you’re done. See?” Crystal blushed at hearing her own mother using the word ‘Boobs’ but did as instructed, even giving a self conscious shake of her shoulders at the right time. The bra felt weird. Not uncomfortable, it was just that she wasn’t used to wearing anything around her chest like that.

“That’s why girls wear training bras.” her mother said when she mentioned it. “They get you used to the feeling. You’ll adjust soon enough. And running around without one may sound like a good idea but trust me when I say you don’t want to do that too often. Not when you’re endowed like that. Now finish getting dressed and come down stairs, we need to get started on supper.”
1213322222122112211122.title: Tim gets cleaned up

choices: It was an Online Dating site.
Crystal is a Mail Order Bride.
12133222221221122111222.content:
Years ago Janet had found it far easier to do all the work preparing supper by herself than to deal with an uncooperative child that fought and argued every step of the way, so she was understandably hesitant to ask Crystal to help. But to her pleasant surprise Crystal seemed not only willing but actually happy to help with making the meal. Curious to see how far this would go, Janet decided they should make a homemade chicken soup. Crystal was enthusiastic about cooking, even though she was totally unskilled in the kitchen. Janet found herself teaching Crystal the basics of how to boil water, safely chop vegetables, and how to stop the bleeding and correctly apply a knuckle bandage.

“Should I turn the heat up so they’ll cook faster?” Crystal asked as she stirred the pot.

“No, We’re not trying to brown them, just soften them up to release the flavors. That takes time. Just stir the pot once in a while to keep them from burning. How’s the finger.”

“I think it’s stopped bleeding. I can’t really see under the bandage. Those knives are too sharp. That’s dangerous.”

“Actually they are safer that way. With a dull knife you need to apply too much pressure and the risk of slipping is higher. Now watch and I’ll show you an easy way to peel garlic.” Janet said, taking the clove and laying it on the cutting board. She pressed it flat with the heel of the knife. “See, the skin comes right off. Peeled and crushed in one swoop.” Discarding the skin, she added the crushed paste to the bottom of the pot and gave the mass a stir, then handed the spoon back to Crystal.

“I thought that’s what the garlic press is for.”

“Too much effort to dig it out and then clean it afterwards. This works just as well. How’s the broth doing?”

The helpful message on the microwave control panel only said it was ‘Defrosting’ so Crystal stood on her tiptoes and peered through the microwave door. “It looks like it’s melting, I’m not sure.” She said after a minute. “Why does it have to be a solid block of ice anyway?”

“I make the broth up and freeze it. This batch is from the chicken dinner we had back in April. I’ll show you how it’s done next time we cook a whole chicken.”

Crystal is really taking this seriously, Janet thought. She’d dug out one of her old full front aprons for the girl to wear, more to keep the one set of clothes the girl owned from getting spilled on than anything else. Now, as she watched the girl alternated between stirring the vegetables and peering into the microwave, she couldn’t help but be struck by how different from the old Tim her new daughter was acting.

“So how did you meet Tim?” she asked suddenly.

Crystal turned towards her, confusion on her face. “Uh, mom,” She said, “I am Tim, remember.”

Janet shook her head. “Only three people know that.” She said. “You, me, and your father. To the rest of the world you are Crystal. Unless you want to tell them all how Tim got himself trapped in the suit of a pregnant girl.”

Crystal visibly shuddered at that. She hadn’t thought that far ahead, but now that mom mentioned it, she couldn’t possibly tell people the truth. Once word got out there would be no end to the teasing and humiliation.

“So you’re going to have to tell people something, and it’s better to have your story prepared ahead of time. So,” Janet repeated “How did you meet Tim?

Crystal gave the steaming vegetables another stir as she thought about it. “I don’t know. Maybe at the mall? Shopping?”

“Does Tim go to the mall very often?”

“No,” the girl admitted. “He hated shopping, and the only other reason to be at the mall is to hang with friends, which he doesn’t. Maybe at the Library?”

“Tim reading books?” Janet said incredulously, “I can’t see Tim at the library.” Crystal was about to tell her Tim went all the time for the free WiFi, but Janet continued before Crystal could correct her. “And what would a girl from out of town be doing at the library?”

“Using the WiFi?”

Janet looked at her, then shook her head. “She’d also need a reason to be in town. And it should be something in character for Tim. Something everyone would say ‘Oh yeah, I can see him doing that’.”

“Maybe online?” Crystal thought for a second before correcting that “Except that Tim didn’t exactly go online to meet people. Maybe at a park? I don’t know. Where do people go to meet other people?”

“And it would be someplace out of town.” Janet said. “Remember, Crystal isn’t from around here.”

Both their eyes widened as they had the same thought.
12133222221221122111222.title: Making Supper

choices: Crystal has a license and a car.
121332222212211221112222.content:
“Game-a-Con.” They both said at the same time.

Game-a-Con had been the one event that Tim was sure to attend every year. A smaller gathering of nerds, geeks, cosplayers, and RPG enthusiasts, it didn’t attract the hype and publicity of the bigger conventions. It was also held in Centerville, which was a 90 minute drive west. The big plus was that nobody at school other than Tim had showed the slightest interest in attending. That Tim would meet a girl might be more than just a little out of character for him, but if it was going to happen anywhere, Game-a-Con would have been the place.

“So you struck up a conversation at the convention, exchanged phone numbers, and started a relationship.”

“Yeah.” Crystal said, giving the vegetables another stir. “Something like that.”

“So what attracted him to you?”

“I don’t know.” Crystal shrugged. “What does it matter?”

“Little details like that are important for girls. Other girls will ask and your answers need to be consistent. What would you be doing to make someone like Tim notice you?”

“Breathing.” was Crystal’s immediate thought, but as she stirred the pot she mulled the question over. Mom was right. Being a gamer and surrounded by intricately detailed plastic and digital models of the female form, that old joke about his type just having a pulse didn’t apply to Tim. She thought about it for several seconds, then realized what would attract Tim’s attention more than anything else.

“I was cosplaying as Wonder Woman.” She said suddenly. “He came up to me and told me he loved my costume, and that my hair was perfectly suited to it.”

“Dressed as Wonder Woman, and he complemented your hair?”

Crystal thought for a second “No,” she said. “He said my hair was the right colour and style, but way too long for the character.”

“Now that sounds like something he would say.” Janet admitted. Tim would never have played a straight complement.

“And then we went back to the hotel room and had sex, I got pregnant, and here I am.”

Janet shook her head. “Nope. Doesn’t work that way. Women need more than a back handed complement to fall in bed with someone.” She took the now bubbling broth out of the microwave. “Besides, the timing doesn’t work.”

“So we had coffee and talked a bit, and he turned charming and persuasive?”

“This is Tim we’re talking about. He doesn’t do charming, and he’s more persistent than persuasive. I don’t think you’d sleep with him just because it was the only way he’d leave you alone.” Janet poured the broth in with the vegetables. “Give that a stir, would you?”

“Hey, he can be charming when he tries to be.” Crystal stirred the soup a little more vigorously than was necessary. “Besides, it was me he seduced. You weren’t there. We talked and he paid me complements and bought me coffee and the next thing you know we were doing it.”

“Maybe in porn that works but not in the real world. Besides, you’re only 6 weeks along. Game-a-Con was back in March.”

“So maybe we’ve been meeting up every weekend since then.”

Janet tapped her lip thoughtfully. “Not every weekend, but yeah, on occasion. Going to movies and such, talking over coffee. Finding
common ground. Not having sex until fairly recently. You both would have kept quiet about it because you knew how much your friends would tease you.”

“Maybe I would have.” Crystal said ruefully, “Tim would have bragged about it to anyone who would listen.” Crystal was finding it increasingly easy to talk about Tim in the second person, like he was a separate entity altogether.

“Not if Crystal begged him not to. One thing about Tim was he always kept a promise.” Janet set the stove to simmer and started clearing away the clutter on the table. “No need to stir it too often now, that will only interrupt the simmering process. Just make sure the lid is slightly off so that it doesn’t boil over.”

“So maybe one night Crystal’s parents were out of town and they thought she was home alone studying, only she invited Tim over instead and that’s when they did it?” Crystal said thoughtfully.

“That happens,” Janet said. “That’s sort of why we parents discourage that sort of thing.”

“How was Tim getting there?” Crystal suddenly asked. “He doesn’t have a drivers license and has to beg a ride everywhere.”
You have the following choices.
121332222212211221112222.title: They met at Comicon.

1213322222122112211122222.content:
“So maybe his father and I are in on it? No, that wouldn’t work. We’d have to know they were dating, plus we’d want to meet the parents of the girl.”

“Unless he told you his old gaming group had started up again." Crystal said "Or a new one. There’s the Magic Legions Café in Centerville. That’s where some of the Game-a-Con kids hang out. If he got you to drop him off and pick him up there, he’d have five or six hours of freedom. All he’d have to do is rave about how well his rogue did that night and you’d be none the wiser.”

Janet looked at Crystal thoughtfully. “That might work. Centerville is over an hour’s drive, but we would have driven him over on week-ends if we thought he was making friends again.”

“We’d meet inside,” Said Crystal, ignoring the obvious slight about friends as she added more details. “Maybe we’d play a short game of something just so the others wouldn’t get suspicious, then sneak out the back. As long as we were back by the time you came to pick him up, no one would know.”

Janet nodded. “And then six weeks ago your parents left you on your own to study. That night when you met up the two of you snuck back to your place and got a little carried away. You thought you were being safe but the condom Tim used broke. Not surprising, as he has been carrying in his wallet for the last two years.”

Crystal looked at Janet in shock. “How did you know about the condom” she gasped.

Janet just smiled. “Parents know a lot more than you kids give them credit for.” She said. “Except maybe for Mr. MacArthur, who naively believed his little girl always stayed home studying instead of sneaking out at night to meet a boy. And as soon as he found out his baby girl was expecting a baby of her own, good old ultra conservative Mr. MacArthur threw his little darling out into the street with nothing more than the clothes on her back.”

“With nowhere else to turn she came to Tim for help.” Crystal added.

“Of course,” Janet continued “Poor Crystal had no way of knowing that the father of her child had been just been sent away to Military school that very afternoon. Fortunately for her Tim’s parents felt sorry for the poor waif, and since they now had an extra room they invited her to live with them.”

Crystal clapped her hands with glee. She’d always enjoyed inventing back stories for her dungeon characters, and she hadn’t realized just how much she’d missed doing that. She’d also had no idea her mother had such a vivid imagination. With the two of them bouncing ideas off each other this was as much fun as she’d had in ages.

“So Tim ends up living the dream,” Crystal said wistfully “Learning how to fly planes and bomb tanks while his knocked up girlfriend is stuck living with his parents and learning how to make soup.”

“I wouldn’t call it a dream,” Janet said, checking the soup pot to make sure it wasn’t boiling over. “It is a navy boot camp after all. I don’t think they allow dreams.”

“The navy?” Crystal seemed shocked “Why would Tim join the navy. He hates boats.”

“It was that or face going to jail.”

Now Crystal looked both shocked and confused. “Why would Tim go to Jail?”

12133222221221122111222222.content:
“Oh,” Janet said, “I may have forgotten to mention. I got a call from the police today. There was a report of online bullying filed against Tim. The officer is a friend and wanted to give me the opportunity to resolve the issue before they turned it over to the county prosecutor. Given the circumstances and the evidence available he felt there was a real good chance of conviction if the case went to trial. Sending Tim off to a military school seemed like a good compromise.”

“But the Navy?”

“It was his father’s idea actually. He really wants to tell people his son is in the navy for some reason. I think it’s because he watches too much NCIS.”

“So dad knows about this?” Crystal asked, her heart sinking a little. She knew he would find out eventually. She was just hoping to avoid the moment as long as possible.

“Of course he knows.” Janet started ladling the steaming soup into bowls she’d pulled from the cupboard. “I mentioned that earlier.” She set the bowls on the table “Be a dear and dig the buns out of the breadbox, will you? The small dinner rolls should be nice with the soup, I think.” She pulled the tub of margarine out of the fridge and set it on the table. “I called him when you went upstairs.”

Crystal stirred her soup quietly for a couple of moments, then asked meekly “So how did he take the news?”

“That his son had bought a body suit so he could dress up like a girl? He actually knew about the suit before he left. He was there when I unpacked it.” She paused to take another spoonful of soup. “He was a little confused about it, but I think he figures it’s a phase you’re going through. We might want to wait a bit before we tell him just how long you’re going to be wearing it though. Honestly, I think he will be okay once he gets a chance to think it over. He always wanted what was best for you.” Janet put her spoon down and looked Crystal in the eyes, her face serious. “If he didn’t have to fly to Seattle I think the two of you would be having a very serious discussion about Tim’s antics these last couple of days.”

Crystal felt her stomach clutch in dread. She suddenly had a bad feeling about the direction the conversation was about to go. Sure enough, Janet didn’t disappoint her.

“Tim’s behavior was becoming completely unacceptable. Shipping him off to a military school was actually one of the better options the police suggested, considering Juvenile Detention was another.”

Crystal lowered her eyes and stared at her soup bowl. Dinner had once again become the family meeting where the misdeeds of the day were recounted and punishment was handed out. There hadn’t been one of those in a while, not because Tim had been on good behavior, but because he had done his best to avoid mealtimes with his parents. But unlike Tim, who would have stormed away from the table long before the conversation had reached this point, Crystal just sat there and listened as mom gave a far more detailed account of Tim’s activities than Crystal expected her to know about.

“Which is why you have lost all internet privileges. No websites, no forums, no social media, and no chat. No internet, period.” Janet concluded

At this Crystal looked up. “But I need the internet.” she protested, “For school!”

Janet gave her that level look that all mothers seem to have mastered. The one that said ‘Oh really? Pull the other one.’

Crystal meekly lowered her eyes again “Well, maybe not right away.”

Janet looked at her thoughtfully. “You’re right though.” She said. “You will need the internet for classes.”

“Yeah,” Crystal said sadly, “But that won’t be for several months now.”

“I wouldn’t be too sure. Timothy Zale may have lost all internet privileges, but Crystal MacArthur, being a guest in this house, will be allowed access the internet. BUT only from the laptop in the den AND only for the purposes of schoolwork.”

The hope that had sprang up in Crystals eyes faded as she heard the conditions. “But that laptop is a piece of junk!”
She trailed off as the second condition registered. “Wait, Schoolwork?” Crystal went pale “You can’t be serious.”

“You’re not sitting around the house all day. As soon as possible, we’re getting you back into school.”

“I can’t go to school like this. Everyone will laugh.”

Janet shook her head. “If you went as Tim, yes. As the new transfer student Crystal MacArthur, they wouldn’t know any different.”

“You’re going to make me go to school as a girl?”

“No, I’m going to make you go to school as you, which just happens to be a girl now.”
12133222221221122111222222.title: Cyberbullying

choices: Calling Dad to fill him in.
121332222212211221112222222.content:
Crystal just sat there, slowly eating the soup cooling in front of her. In the back of her mind she’d sort of hoped she would be done with school. Now that too had been taken away.

“It’s one thing to be a girl around you and dad,” she said softly. “I don’t know if I can pull it off at school.”

“That’s nonsense.” Janet said firmly “I remember that you used to love being in character while gaming, and you used to be quite good at it too. This is the same, only now instead of crashing around the house as an Orc, you are playing a delicate maiden.”

“I was never an Orc.” Crystal said “And that was just a game. I don’t know if I can pull it off for real.” She said this slowly.

“Earlier we were talking and you kept referring to Tim like he was another person.” Janet pointed out. “With practice that will become second nature.” then she paused, “You know something?” Janet pointed out thoughtfully, “This whole situation might just work out for the best.” Crystal looked at her questioningly, so she explained. “Everyone will think Tim has been sent away, that he's being punished for all the shit he's pulled.” Janet said as she buttered another piece of bread. “You, on the other hand, get to stay here with us and make a fresh start. We get the chance to become a family again.”

Crystal realized she was right. It had been easier to talk about Tim like he was a separate person. This could work, she thought with growing excitement. No longer would she be obnoxious teen with all the personality of an ingrown toenail. Now everyone would know her as ‘Crystal MacArthur’, unfortunately pregnant teen but still a really likable person.

“If I’m going to pull this off,” Crystal said, “What I need to do is to sit down and decide my character is. What she likes and dislikes. Her motivations. Her hobbies. Favorite music and movies.” Crystal got that far away look in her eyes that she did when she was thinking up a character.

“Don’t try to make them too different from what Tim liked.” Janet cautioned “You two did have some mutual interests after all, that’s what drew you together. But you should have some differences too. Try to think of some things that you might like to try but didn’t get the chance.”

Janet finished her soup and started clearing the dishes. Without really thinking, Crystal got up and helped. It just seemed like the right thing to do.

“I want you to take the rest of the evening and write out your background. Show it to me and I’ll see if I can poke holes in it. Then we’ll change it around until we come up with something that works.”

“There are back ground creator engines I used to use, only they are on the internet.” Crystal said, hesitantly. “Would it be okay if I used them for this?”

Janet looked at Crystal for a moment, weighing the convenience of an auto generated personality against her total ban of the use of the internet. “I suppose we can consider this to be school work,” She conceded. “But I still have to be there when you use them.”

Crystal rolled her eyes, but otherwise did not raise any objections.

“Just remember, we’re not going for pathos here. We want something as boring and ordinary as possible under the circumstances.”

While Crystal worked up her background story, Janet contacted the bodysuit site and discovered that, if she sent in Tim’s academic transcript, they would provide a similar one in Crystal’s name. It was part of their ‘Keep Kids in School’ program.

The rest of the evening was spent revising and polishing Crystal’s background story

1213322222122112211122222223.content:
Robert Zale looked around his Hotel Room and sighed, gathering up the mess of papers spilling across the small desk and stuffing them back into the manila folder. The managing director had pressed it into his hands at the end of the whirlwind tour this afternoon, telling him it was a summary of the issues they’d been having with the plant expansion. He had been reading through it since he’d checked in, but it really didn’t contained any more information than what he had picked up walking around the plant this afternoon. The problems were not that difficult to solve, and from what he had read in the file the current managers seemed to have everything under control, which meant the trip had been unnecessary. He’d be able to tell more after the round of management meetings he had scheduled for the morning. Right now though, he wanted something to eat.

There was a restaurant bar conveniently attached to the hotel, so he grabbed a table and ordered a steak sandwich and a couple of beers from the cute if somewhat overly bubbly waitress, flirting with her as he did so. It was totally meaningless, he told himself, and Janet wasn’t here to object, so what was the harm. And what did you expect from a man alone on the road?

The thought of Janet getting mad over something as trivial as trading innuendo laced comments with a pretty waitress brought his thoughts back to the earlier phone conversation he’d had an hour earlier. Janet had wasted no time filling him in on the situation, seemingly taking great delight in describing just how different this new girl was from his son.

As Robert ate he mulled over what his wife had said. It wasn’t unusual that the topic of the entire phone conversation had been about Tim and his latest shenanigans. That kid was always up to something, that was for sure. And just when he thought the kid had peaked and couldn’t do worse, he would come up with something new and surprise him. For years now he’d been after that kid to straighten up his act or face the consequences. Many a time he’d been this close to taking off his belt, ready to use his father’s time proven method of teaching a kid some common sense. That’s how his father would have dealt with it. But every time his wife had stopped him, telling him you can’t do that anymore, that a child today needed to be raised with patience and understanding.

Just look at what patience and understanding had gotten him, he thought with an ironic chuckle. The thought Tim getting a girl pregnant had been so far down the list of the consequences that he’d never really considered the possibility. Had the boy been more like his father it would have been expected, but Tim’s personality had seemed like the world’s most effective form of birth control imaginable. The news that he’d actually chosen to put on that dammed suit and live as an unwed teenage mother had been just one more sign of just how badly his mother had raised him.

In a way that was a relief. At least now he didn’t have to disown him. The boy had always been a disappointment anyway, always reading and playing stupid fantasy games instead of being outside playing sports like any real red blooded son should. It was somehow fitting that he should wind up pregnant and in the kitchen learning how to cook.

He ordered another beer, drinking it while watching the football game on the TV over the bar. He was almost finished when recalled what the manual said about combining DNA from the suit donor and the host. Since Tim was the host, any kid he had would technically be his grandson. If Robert played it right, he could still teach the kid the proper way a boy should behave. He hadn’t lost a son, he’d gained another chance, and this time he would make sure the kid was raised right.

With this happy thought Robert called for the bill, giving the waitress a friendly couple of pats on the butt as she went passed, then adding a moderately generous tip to make up for the scowl she gave him. Feeling quite pleased with himself he tottered back to his hotel room to reread the files before calling it a night.

13222211.content:
Clicking on the thumbnail of the Velma Dinkley cosplayer sends you to the page describing the bodysuit. The pictures catch your eyes first: several of “Velma” looking very much like the cartoon version brought precisely to life. Apart from her face — no obvious makeup — being rather too pretty and the trademark Velma freckles being a little excessive, in a band from cheekbone over nose to other cheekbone, she’s almost exactly right, wearing not-too-cartoonish versions of Velma’s usual clothes, toned down just enough that someone might wear them in everyday life instead of as part of a costume. Her auburn hair doesn’t exactly go with her skin tone, and the style is just faintly too perfect, but otherwise it doesn’t look like a wig. Her glasses, with Velma’s classic near-rectangular lenses, are definitely real functional glasses a very nearsighted woman might wear.

The next picture shows the cosplayer partly out of the Velma costume. Her dark brown hair is in a pixie cut, her thick-lensed glasses are rimless, and on her trim torso she’s wearing the well-padded bra that gave her Velma’s generous bustline. More pictures: well-tailored long-skirted rose-colored business suit with matching pink-framed glasses, classic short-skirted Little Black Dress, a couple of casual outfits. She looks intelligent, alert, sweet — and because of that face, always obviously like a slender, twenty-something real-life Velma Dinkley.

There’s a link marked Wearer Pictures and Testimonials, so you click that and have a look. There are two sets. The pictures are snapshots rather than the professional-looking ones of the previous page; many are obviously cropped to hide other people or clues about location, but the Velmas are both in quite a variety of outfits and hairstyles and situations, looking adorkable or even downright beautiful. 13222211111124.content:
Afraid this is all some sort of hallucination, or ... or... or... You race outside to the fresh air, and hopefully a clearer head.

Checking the glasses once more, you hold them in front of your eyes, and pull them away. Experimenting you confirm, you really need them. Swallowing a gasp, that's threatening to become a whimper, you know that if you're eyes have changed, then so has the rest of your body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/48/55/d7/...

A quick game of grab-hands, confirms your new body is as female... and as sensitive as you feared.

If it's not the air... It must be that your clothes are too tight. That they're restricting the blood flow and making this all feel real. If you can't trust your hands, perhaps you can trust your eyes.

The skirt feels real... But there's only one way to be sure. Easing it down one round hip, you hope the illusion will shatter, but instead you only see the hint of your pink panties.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/8d/01/79/...

It's hard to believe how detailed this ... this contagion is...

Looking away and back, you check that it's still the same details, not shifting like some nightmare... or a dream.

If it's real, perhaps the clothes are impregnated with something that causes hallucinations. You drop the skirt to pool around your stubby legs, and kick it aside as if that's the cause of all these problems.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/2c/e7/50/...

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/0a/ae/55/...

Tossing the sweater onto the pile of 'contaminated' clothes, you feel a sense of vulnerability standing there in just your pink underwear. Swallowing your wail, until it's just a whimper in your throat you know what you need to do next.

Fumbling you unfasten the bra, allowing it to fall to the ground. Some unknown instinct makes you cup and cradle your bust with your hands.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/72/7e/ae/...

Surely, you must be free of any impregnated clothes. Certain that if the panties are ripped free, that's the last thing that can be contaminated.

Chest rising and falling, you gulp the clean, fresh air deep into your lungs. But, it's undeniable! That bodysuit delivered totally on its' promise. You're Velma for life, a High IQ nerd with a hot body that's hidden beneath too many unflattering layers.

Cheeks burning, you pick up the abandoned items and start slipping them back on. Slipping the glasses back into place feels like the final surrender. From now on, you'll be Velma.

You confess, there's surely worse fates. You shudder as you imagine being stuck as the bimbo Daphne, doomed to be the eternal Damsel in Distress.

Your IQ gives you options, and your body means you can wrap nerds around your fingers...

Humming "Que será será" you wander off into your future...

132222111112.content:
You’re about to unzip the very ill-fitting but highly elastic Velma-cosplayer bodysuit you’re wearing — the obvious zipper goes from just under its chin down to its waist — when, in maybe two seconds, first the big zipper pull and then the rest of the zipper sink into you and disappear! It hurts, but only for a moment, and before you can even cry out, you find that you can’t move much and you’re stuck standing there, watching your steadily-changing reflection in the mirror-covered sliding doors of your closet. As if to make it easier for you to watch, the cloudy silicone lenses of the bodysuit’s fake glasses change into real lenses and you go nearsighted exactly enough that the lenses are perfect for you. The blue irises of your eyes turn brown, too. Your body goes just numb enough that its combination with the cosplayer bodysuit and resulting transformation into the girl are almost painless.

After the glasses and your eyes change, the other changes all seem to happen at once. You’re squeezed relentlessly all over as what had been the bodysuit but is now swiftly becoming your new skin and the clothes and wig for your Velma Dinkley cosplay shrink to their proper sizes, forcing your body into suitable girl-innards. Your masculine skull and pelvis not only shrink but become feminine, the tiny shoes ensure that you have dainty little feet inside them, your leg bones shorten and become delicate even as your ribcage shrinks. Your heart pounds away from your excitement but doesn’t miss a beat as it becomes suitably smaller. All of you changes as necessary, and perhaps strangely you don’t even realize at first how much height you’re losing.

In maybe five minutes the changes are over. A girl of sixteen with a powerful resemblance to Velma Dinkley looks back from the mirrored doors — you! You’re wearing a comfortable wig on your head, your glasses are a perfect fit and their lenses exactly the right strength, the heavily-padded bra that gives you Velma’s impressive chest is just faintly uncomfortable, the rest of your clothes fit well. You raise your new hands a little and look at them: neatly-trimmed short fingernails without polish, just right for the tomboyish Velma, slightly short but delicate feminine fingers. “Jinkies...” you say out loud Allowing for hearing your voice from inside your head, it’s perfect.

You feel great You completely understand why wearers of this bodysuit always choose to make it permanent. Your mind is clear and you seem to have a much better brain now. You
132222111112.title: The Velma suit starts combining with you!

You can move freely now — and when you do, your transformed body moves with feminine grace as you go over to the big open suitcase covering much of your former self’s bed. (Your newly female body does seem a great improvement.) There’s a comically big magnifying glass (4-inch glass lens in a steel frame on a black hard-plastic handle, antique or very retro) you pick up with your left hand, and a three-foot plush effigy of Scooby-Doo you tuck under your right arm. “We’ve got a new mystery here, Scoob!” you tell the plush figure. “A twenty-year-old college boy put on a rather unrealistic bodysuit of a cute myopic 16-year-old girl cosplaying as Velma Dinkley,” you say, “and it seems he’s combined with the suit and become the cosplaying girl! Sounds impossible, doesn’t it?”

13222211111212.content:
You make a big show of examining the Scooby-Doo plushie under the magnifying glass, but you don’t need the magnifying glass to see an obvious zipper pull at the nape of its neck! “Jinkies!” you cry out, and it’s a perfectly natural thing for you to say, as if Velma Dinkley is a real teenager and you are she! “It’s a Scooby-Doo bodysuit!”

After your initial assumption you’re inclined to be skeptical, but you find it easy to move the zipper pull from the back of the plushie’s neck almost to its tail. As you do that, the plushie changes, going from plushie to a sort of hollow elastic rubbery though fur-covered suit. When it sags it just seems to get bigger, so that soon you’re holding a bodysuit that looks like the skin of Scooby-Doo — if Scooby-Doo were a real though somewhat anthropomorphic dog! A surprisingly big instruction manual is inside the suit.

There’s also a Quick Start instruction sheet for the suit and you put the suit atop the open suitcase and read it. Soon you’ve learned that the Scooby-Doo suit is rather like the suit that made you the teenaged girl you now are, except that it can be removed and change an apparently real Scooby-Doo back into the suit and its wearer... but the suit isn’t easy to remove with Scooby-Doo paws instead of hands. A wearer really needs someone to let him or her out... it’s not guaranteed that he or she can get out of this bodysuit unaided.
13222211111212.title: Notice something about the plushie.

You’ve had enough change in your life already and you don’t want to risk getting stuck as Scooby-Doo, though cosplaying with a friend transformed into him could be great fun. You zip shut the suit (without the manuals in it), and soon it again looks and feels like the much smaller plushie it was earlier. The zipper pull tucks away neatly so it’s not obvious.

You put the plushie back in the suitcase and take out a foam wig block you noticed earlier. You set it down on your dresser, intending to take off your Velma cosplay wig.

Fortunately you’re very careful in trying to take off what you’re sure was initially an excellent Velma Dinkley wig, because it’s not a wig any more but your own hair! You tug firmly at it but it’s obviously a part of you now. Also, though at first it struck you as an excellent wig made from real human Asian hair and dyed auburn, it now seems to be real undyed auburn hair that grew out of your own scalp. Initially your complexion didn’t match it, your freckles seemed those of a brunette with no redhead genes, but now your freckles are redhead-freckles and your skin is that of a natural redhead who might well have exactly this shade of auburn hair! “Jinkies!” you say out loud again. “I really am Velma Dinkley brought to life!”

Your bra now seems entirely comfortable, and you suspect that it’s not a padded bra any more, that your breasts are all real and probably full D-cups. You feel at your waist, and under the soft cashmere of your sweater there’s just a slight plumpness to your belly.

You’re still a Velma cosplayer, but one whose physical resemblance to the cartoon girl is now uncannily close. Maybe your mind has been altered, too? You’re
1322221111121212.title: It’s become your real hair!

Okay, you got your bodysuit — in practice, your new body and gender and identity — for free, but you didn’t get what bodysuits.com claimed you would! You’re supposed to be a little brunette, physically only sixteen, with her hair in a pixie cut, and a very strong facial resemblance to the cartoon character Velma Dinkley, and perhaps you were after the bodysuit initially combined with you, but now you’re apparently Velma brought to life!

You quickly undress and examine yourself critically in the mirror-covered sliding doors of your bedroom closet. The naked sixteen-year-old girl in the mirror looks completely real, and exactly as if she were the inspiration for the cartoon Velma. The slight drollness of her very pretty face is caricatured in Velma, and her many cute freckles stylized to just a few. Definitely her breasts need a standard D-cup bra, and the slight puppy fat at her waist mars her otherwise excellent figure just a little. She has sweet hips and a just generous enough rear. You clearly remember how you thought as your male self, and though the girl in the mirror is ridiculously like Velma, former-you would have thought her genuinely hot.

Still naked, you go over to the open suitcase on your bed and check your new driver’s license and student ID from the wallet in one of the purses. You don’t think that you had your Velma hair in the photos before, but you definitely do now. At least they have the name you chose, Emma Jane Smith, and not something like Thelma Brinkley. The birth certificate and Social Security card in the envelope marked Documents have the same name. You note that the birthday and birthplace on the birth certificate are the same as your former self’s.

You do like your body but you’re still annoyed. You
13222211111212122.title: annoyed at bodysuits.com for this.

132222111112121222.content:
It’s about dinner time but you’re not hungry. I was a lot bigger as a boy, you think. Maybe I won’t eat for weeks, just digest all the excess body mass I don’t need now I’m Emma Jane. You’re not grossed out by the prospect.

You know you can live happily being stuck as a real-life Velma Dinkley, but it’s not quite what you wanted, so you call the bodysuits.com 24-hour customer service line, expecting that at dinner time you’ll probably have to leave a voice mail. After two rings, your call is answered by
132222111112121222.title: call bodysuits.com to complain.

make a bit more of a fuss anyway.
1322221111121212222.content:
Two rings, and then an uncommonly beautiful if businesslike female voice answers, “Bodysuits dot com Customer Service. I’m Vanessa. Am I speaking with Emma Jane Smith?”

You’re taken aback and say, “Uh, I guess I am Emma Jane Smith now, yes.”

“What can we do for you, Miz Smith?” Damn, she has a beautiful voice She’s not trying to be sexy, and anyway you seem to be a thoroughly heterosexual girl of sixteen now, but you envy her that voice, although your Velma Dinkley voice has its own charm.

You explain your situation, explain that you’ve been transformed permanently into not the little short-haired brunette Velma Dinkley cosplayer you expected to become, but into a real-life version of Velma.

Vanessa listens patiently, and when your finished, she says, “I’m so sorry, Miz Smith! Even just listening to your voice makes your situation very obvious! On the one hand I’m pleased at how perfect a Velma Dinkley voice our permanent bodysuit has given you, but on the other, I understand that you might not want to speak in that voice by default! Please hold on the line while I investigate how this happened and see what we can do for you.”

Vanessa does not put you on hold, but lets you listen as she talks you through her investigation of records associated with the order placed by the young man you used to be. You listen, fascinated, enjoying her beautiful voice and clear explanations of what happened. It seems that one employee made one mistake and you were shipped a slightly different suit from what you ordered: there was a special custom real-Velma suit already in stock that another customer had decided against, forfeiting a large cash deposit, and a well-meaning employee hadn’t double-checked that it was exactly what you wanted and decided to save you ten days of waiting by shipping it instead.

“So what happens now?” you ask. But you’ve been looking at your naked-Velma reflection during the call, and listening to your stuck-as-Velma voice, and you’ve fallen in love with yourself...

“Legally, Miz Smith, we’re not required to do anything more,” says Vanessa, though in very apologetic tones. “You agreed to our terms of sale, though strictly speaking it wasn’t a sale but a promotional gift! However, we value our customers, so we’ll do what we can! You do realize that none of our products will work on your newly-transformed body for three to six months?”

“Yes,” you say. “I was hoping for at least a new voice.”

“I’m very happy with mine,” says Vanessa, “and we’d be happy to give you a copy, but it simply won’t work yet! We can send you test items regularly starting in ten weeks, but until a test shows that your new body is ready to cooperate with our products, we can’t make a temporary or permanent change in the woman you’ve become.”

Damn it, but you look good and you sound good, and the prospect of being called Velma by everyone for at least three months isn’t that bad. You decide to
1322221111121212222.title: a woman with a very beautiful voice.

13222211111212122221.content:
“Well, I guess I’ll just have to wait,” you say over the phone to Vanessa. “Maybe in a few months I’ll have a boyfriend begging me not to change a thing about myself. Oh, another thing. Do I really have a new identity as Emma Jane Smith?”

Vanessa assures you that as far as the government and your university are concerned, you do, and to be sure to call again if you need more help.

After the call, you admire your body some more, try on clothes from the suitcase, and so on. By bedtime you’ve emptied the suitcase, put away your new clothes, had a nice warm shower you didn’t really need but that made you even more at home with the new you. It’s Friday evening but you go to bed relatively early.

You go over to the big open suitcase on your bed and get from it the foam wig block you thought you’d seen. You put the wig block on your dresser and then carefully remove your cosplay wig and put it on the block. Just as with the pictures on the bodysuits.com website, your reflection in the closet door shows that your pixie-cut brown hair doesn’t make you look less like Velma Dinkley. You briefly remove your glasses — you’re apparently not quite as myopic as the cartoon Velma — to pull off your baggy orange turtleneck. It’s soft and feels wonderful to the touch and somehow you know it’s cashmere, rather expensive for cosplay. But of course it was part of the suit! If part of the suit can become a real living girl’s skin, part of it can become any material they like...why not cashmere? you think. You’re wearing only a bra under it, not a blouse.

Your cosplay bra has a lot of built-in padding but not as much as you thought. You take it off as if you take off your own bra daily, revealing firm brown-nippled breasts that somehow you know take a B or C cup brassiere, depending on brand. Of course they’re firm. I’m a 16-year-old girl now, you think. Your armpits look hairless, not merely shaved. Maybe if my skin used to be a girl bodysuit, it doesn’t grow hair there?

You take off the cute Velma shoes and the lambswool stockings and the raw silk skirt — in a way, again they must have cost nothing, though you worry about cleaning them if you cosplay a lot — and finally your comfortable panties. Lovely perfectly-shaven legs (or permanently hairless?), not quite stocky, and pubic hair matching the hair on your head, clipped short.

You realize that you’re not turned on by the cute-faced, sweetly-curved high school girl in the mirror — you really do look sixteen. Any heterosexual-male desire for an attractive woman, jailbait or not, seems to have been completely and permanently satisfied by your being one, and this seems to have left you utterly satisfied with your new body. “It’s me,” you say out loud. “It’s so me.” Strictly speaking, that should be, “It’s I,” you think, and break down in the cutest, least-annoying giggles you’ve ever heard.

Former-you’s phone chimes — you realize that your hearing is now much more acute than before — and you go the next room, still naked and delighted by the complete rightness of your sweet firm breasts and in fact your whole new body, to check it for a message.

1322221111122.title: undress to check out your new body.

They had a free bodysuit offer that I was lucky or unlucky enough to get. I couldn’t believe that what they had could actually be real! When the suit arrived, it looked so fake that I tried it on just for the hell of it, sure it wouldn’t work on me. Of course it did work.

You write: They told you! So much for privacy

But you’ve always wanted to be more intelligent, though you were actually pretty bright, & you were always chasing after cute brainy girls you couldn’t get, so if you got a free bodysuit it’s no big leap to guess you’re stuck as Little Miss Adorkable...what’s your name?

Gwendolyn Jane, you text back.

Jim texts back a string of laughing-out-loud emojis and goes on Perfect! Dorky but oddly sexy. Mind if I come over for a visit, Gwen?

132222111112212.title: scary.

Replacing your boy clothes with your girl clothes, wearing your girlish nightgown, but mostly just being a 16-year-old nerd girl with such a girl’s brain has made you much more comfortable with Jim’s visit tomorrow. It’s dinner time and you’re not hungry. Maybe I’ve sort of eaten the extra body weight I had as a guy, you think, so I won’t need much food for a while. This is going to go on until there’s nothing left inside my skin but Gwendolyn Jane innards, isn’t it? you think. And you’re right.

1322221111122121.title: not so bad.

You wake up early the next morning after a surreal but funny dream that you knew was a dream from the start. (Supposedly one can sometimes take control of a dream if one knows it’s a dream, but you didn’t try.) In the dream, you were getting married to Jim, wearing a very fetching wedding dress, and all your bridesmaids (some originally male) had gotten into the same model of bodysuits.com suit that made you Gwendolyn, and were happily stuck looking identical to you. Your divorced parents were both present, on friendly terms, because they had put on 25-year-old versions of the same suit, and now each had a doting husband. If Jim and I do end up getting married, I’m pretty sure it won’t be like that, you think as you get out of bed. Your misgivings about Jim’s visit are a thing of the past. We’ll just see what happens.

You’re in your cosplay clothes and wig with plenty of time to spare. I’ve never seen a picture or video of a better Velma Dinkley cosplay. Usually they don’t even have the right shape of glasses, you think, let alone a whole new body.

You open the door promptly to Jim when he arrives at ten to eight, dressed nicely for a Saturday morning, more in the mode of a casual evening date. “Hi, Jim!” you almost chirp. “I’m Gwen,” you begin in your usual Gwendolyn voice, then switch to your perfect pedantic Velma Dinkley tones and conclude, “but, of course, you can call me Velma!”

Obviously Jim is surprised, but with that, even before he can recover himself and say something to you, you have the impression that he’s
132222111112212111.title: cosplaying as Velma Dinkley.

choices: on the drive to the restaurant.
1322221111122121111.content:
Your first impression is that Jim’s smitten with you and is at least tempted to propose marriage, but quickly his face and body language go noncommittal. “Why the Velma Dinkley cosplay, Gwendolyn Jane?” Jim asks you.

“The fine product of bodysuits.com that I got yesterday afternoon was a bodysuit of a Velma Dinkley cosplayer,” you explain. “One rubbery thing, fake skin and clothes and glasses and wig fused together, with a comically big zipper from here [you touch your waist with your now-dominant, now-delicate left hand] to here [your left forefinger taps just under your chin]. Absurdly elastic, with plenty of these labels stuck to it.” You show him one of the orange warning labels you had ready.

“Of course you ignored these,” he says, after a quick glance.

Suddenly your powerful girl-brain kicks in and you know exactly how and why you’re Gwendolyn Jane now, but you don’t let on, merely shrug. “Got in with no difficulty, zipped up, waited, was just about to unzip when the zipper sank into me and the boy in the suit was the short girl in very expensive cosplay! I think the turtleneck is cashmere, the skirt raw silk, the wig top-quality human hair. Thought you’d like to see the result.”

“Best Velma cosplay ever!” says Jim. “But we’re going to breakfast, so...”

“Casual dress, yes,” you say. “Excuse me, Jim,” you say, and go to your bedroom, closing and locking its door behind you.

First you turn on your computer, and undress and put away the cosplay wig and clothes while it starts up. You dress quickly: pink-framed glasses, comfy bra and panties and socks, simple pink blouse, jeans, tiny pink sneakers. A quick check of browser history and brief experiments show that former-you didn’t browse the default bodysuits.com website but a subset apparently tailored to the man you were. A little more looking on your machine shows exactly what happened, starting during Jim’s last visit here. Pretty desperate move, but I can’t help but admire his initiative. You shut down the computer and prepare to have a great deal of fun. After combing your pixie-cut hair, you go out to Jim.

Jim’s used to girlfriends who take forever to get dressed, so he’s not suspicious that you’ve just discovered he’s responsible for your new identity. “You look gorgeous, Gwen!” he says.

“Thanks,” you say. “And about age fourteen! My body’s supposed to be physically sixteen, and my ID has your late brother’s birth date on it.” You pick up your purse and hang its long strap over your femininely not-sloping right shoulder, pick up your apartment key in your left hand, and say, “Let’s go!”

“You’re a southpaw,” says Jim.

“And female, too,” you say, “if you haven’t noticed.” Soon you two are heading for his car.

You confront Jim
1322221111122121111.title: fallen in love at first sight.

13222211111221211111.content:
After a little discussion, you and Jim decide on former-you’s favorite diner, and just after Jim makes a U-turn to head back in the proper direction, you ask him, as if the question and its answer are trivial, “So, Jim, how much did you pay bodysuits.com to help trick me into becoming your potential girlfriend?”

Jim sighs gently but doesn’t deny it. “All of a very generous bonus from my job, and some savings. A bit over eleven thousand dollars, I think.”

“Was that for the girlsuit or the subterfuge?” you ask.

Your name is Bernie, you live in New York and have just moved to a nice little apartment in Astoria, Queens.
You are so lucky that you found a well paid job in a computer consulting and service company right after your degreed. So you could move out of your parents house in Connecticut and come to the exiting city on NY.
The company, you are working in located downtown Manhattan in one of those huge sky scrapers in the 12.floor.
Your job is software tester and you are put in a new project team, working for a government order.
Today you are going to join the kick off meeting and arrive at your office right in time.
Before the meeting starts all participants have to sign a strictly disclosure agreement. You wonder how strict the paragraphs written in the document are, but think that this is normal, when you are working for a government project.
Two men in black tuxedoes were also waiting in the meeting room and after all team member have signed the papers the meeting starts.
Your Teamleader Jeff, programmer and web security specialist Anoop, an Indian and software designer Stefanie, a hot blonde woman were in the team with you as a software specialist. You wonder about the rather small team, but maybe the project is also rather small.
Anyhow you will get now the information from those two gentlemen representing the government. You wonder again if they are from FBI or CIA or any other state department you know not much about…
Anyhow the introduce them as agent Brown and agent Black and you are sure that those are faked names, even when they handle you and the team business cards with those names and contact data. They are sitting in some office in Washington D.C and they tell you and the team that the report directly to the presidential office… WOW you think and are exiting what this strange and mysterious project could be. You hope the they will come to terms now and tell you more.
And finally they indeed now come to details and it seems interesting. Agent Brown started to explain:

“Gentlemen and miss Steffi,
welcome to our first meeting. My name is Adolf Brown and I like to give you an overview about the project, what is about, why we need your help and about our expectations and your particular task to contribute.
We also waiting for Miss Jenny Grey, who will take the role of your contact person, but she is stuck somewhere is that awful New York traffic and the bus drivers are on strike so she didn’t get a taxi and but she will be here in a couple of minutes and explain her role then.
Anyhow , the project is about a secret government development and our lack of security which caused that some information and even technology was made public the last days.
We assume to have a mole, therefore it absolutely forbidden to talk to anybody outside this group and Miss Grey! Even your CEO and your families are not allowed to get notice about what you are doing!
If anybody has a problem with this, it will now time to leave!” he offered taking this very serious….
