143.content:
You stared blankly at the screen. A small message box popped up, notifying you that the transaction had been completed. You did question your sanity all the while moving your mouse pointer to click the small 'x' symbol. You had acted on impulse before to satisfy yourself, but this would probably top them all. You have just entered your credit card detail to what seemed like a bodysuit manufacturing company. As if anything like that really exist.

You sighed as you close the browser and moved on to your textbook. The book was particularly boring, filled with theory about economics, but you have to sift though them, bearing in mind trying to graduate with a First Class degree. You read a chapter, something about a guy called Keynes, but all the while, your mind was in the consignment that you would receive in a week time. A sample bodysuit of what was claimed to be a 'generic' girl, five pieces of 'blank' bodysuit, two Zip B Gone and Mind Number as well as one High Frequency Sonicator. You shrugged the worry, even if the website was malicious, there wasn't much money anyway and your credit card's limited to $500. You pushed on with the text, cramming as much as possible in your head.

You made a mental note to notify the receptionist of your hall residence to keep an eye out for Fedex delivery.
143.title: The Life of Jack White

1431.content:
That week passed quickly. You spent most of your time cooped up in your one bedroom suite frantically trying to write up essays, while keeping your social life balanced. It was a good thing that the student bar was a stone throw away from the residence hall. However, while you tried to engross yourself in the various activities, your mind kept going back to the website. It did help that one night, you discovered that the site had went dead.

''Hiya love, there's a package for you.'', Debbie called out as you passed the reception area.

''Huh? What?'', you stopped in your track and walked to her. She disappeared for a moment into the room behind and emerged with what it seemed a sizable box. She was quite aged and you by instinct took the weight off her.

''Thanks, you're a gentleman.'', Debbie smiled. You just smiled nervously, she was in her 50s or 60s with short whitish hair.

''Thanks Debbie.'', you turned away, walking to the lift, you pressed the button with your elbow. On the third try, the button light up.

***


''Holy shit....'', you muttered as you picked out what might've looked like five neatly folded human skins. Carefully, you laid them on your bed, where a minute later, what looked like a skin of a young female joined the pile. Rummaging through the bubble wrap, you fished out what looked like zips - two of them in fact - only aside from the actual metallic part, they were surrounded by elastic transparent strips. They too, joined the pile as did what looked like two cheaply made headphones. You also found something that looked like a small remote control and a user's manual. You knew you would need that manual soon enough.
1431.title: A week later

144.content:
You watch the helicopter come in to land, the last of the guests arriving. The helicopter is the only way out to the remote island, unless you plan for a long trip by boat. Once it leaves, nobody will be able to come or go from the island, or its luxury mansion, for the weekend. Just as you planned.

The island itself has every luxury. Pool, tennis courts, and a well-stocked kitchen and wine cellar. It also has an endless number of CCTV cameras positioned around and a warren of secret passages that allow you to get to almost anywhere in the complex. It's cost millions to bring this all together, but it's going to be worth it. For this weekend you're going to bring the full horror of what your guests have done to the fore. You're going to make each one of them confess, and they're never going to know you're here.

You watch as the twins, Davina and Davis DuCane, take in the surroundings, their mops of bright red hair over immaculate suits - Davina never wears dresses. Beautiful, with just the right number of freckles, they're the stars of their own Las Vegas illusion act, the Amazing DuCanes thrilling two audiences a night with their tricks. They're a pair you have to watch out for: both know every magic trick going, and will be alert for any sleight. They were also complicit in an act of negligence that saw their mentor - and yours - killed in a stunt.

And behind them comes the blonde Anna Winter, heiress to a Georgia fortune, walking in a vision of white and lace. "Oh my," she sighs over-elaborately. "Isn't ayt fabulous? I can't wait to see what our host has in stoah."

Of course, she's no more Anna Winter than you are; her name is Mary-Beth Crane, and she's a confidence trickster. You have files on them all.

You walk away from the monitor, and check on the other guests, waiting already in the building. Dr Phillip Sinclair is playing billiards with the overweight banker, Jordan Green. Green's wife, a power-dressing, over-made up brunette called Jane, is complaining loudly she can't get a signal on her cell. Juanita Lopez, the maid you hired for the weekend, is walking around with a few snacks on a silver platter. Her catering partner - and accomplice in poisoning their previous employer - Ryan Jackson is down in the kitchen. And, finally, the youngest of your guests, Susan Kelvin, is sat, staring moodily at everyone else. Only 19, and already the cause of so much tragedy, she's the only guest who hasn't dressed for the occasion, wearing a hacked-up T-shirt, beads and bracelets, and battered jeans. She's an emo, or goth - you could never tell the difference - with black lipstick, severe mascara behind thick-framed glasses and a hacked, chopped pixie cut with purple hair.

You turn away from the monitors, and walk over to the mask of her. It's perfect, capturing that natural snarl of hers. You run a hand through the short weave of the mask's hair, pausing to touch the piercing in her delicate, pointed nose. With this mask - and the replica glasses and clothes you've acquired - you could pass for her with ease. In fact, with the body suits you've ordered, you can pass for anyone else currently on the island. Each guest and member of staff has been scanned, and a perfect disguise created to replicate their individual style. And you've prepared for this for so long, you know so many secrets about their lives, you're confident you could make a perfect impersonation.

And not just them, too. You have four other suits prepared. Three are ghosts - suits of people whose deaths the unsuspecting guests upstairs have caused. They'll be for your 'hauntings', used to extract a confession. The final suit is a perfect replica of Helen Schutter, the local sheriff. You don't intend on using the Schutter mask unless they figure out a way to call for help. Then you'll use it to make sure the games don't end until they've call confessed.

Yes, confession is the name of the game. Over the next day or so, you plan to trick, scare and seduce confessions from each of them. How they have all escaped justice, one way or another. And when you have their confession on tape, ready for the real sheriff Schutter, you'll put them to sleep. You've got a drug that simulates the effects of death, knocking them unconscious and looking for all the world like they've died. One by one, your guests will find themselves disappearing or 'dying' - until you've wrangled a confession from them all. Your plan is flexible, but if you need to you can knock one of your guests out and take their place for a little while, just to further the tension.

And of course, with nobody else on the island, it's only a matter of time before they start turning on each other.

It's a perfect trap. Nobody dies, everyone confesses, they all get the prison sentences they deserve.

You watch as the last guests arrive in the main lounge. There's a recorded message from you - the mysterious M. S. Tree - explaining the lure you've given them: that each of them will be rewarded with $1,000,000 should they stay the night. Then you will send them off to their bedrooms to get comfortable before dinner... and the games will begin.

But you could start early of course. Already some of the guests are exploring the house. Perhaps you should adopt one of your flawless disguises and mingle with them, sowing the seeds of doubt, before the game begins...
144.title: The Confession Game

1441.content:
"And then, there were none..." You walk across the room, dismissing the disguises for a moment. Part of you wonders if you're even going to impersonate a guest first - a little chill might serve to shake things up before you begin in earnest. But that can wait for now. You walk to your control panel, take a seat, crack your knuckles, and press the chime.

Ding-da-ding-da-da-ding-da-da-ding.

You watch as the guests pause, reacting to the chimes.

"So what's the meaning of that?" Green says, shifting his bulk to look around. Sinclair seems less perturbed: the man has ice in his veins.

"At an educated guest, I imagine our host has arrived."

"Have yew evah met this Mistah Tree?" Mary-Beth's fake Georgia is interrogating Mrs Green. Lopez seems confused, and the DuCanes have sat down together and are listening closely. They'll be the hardest link to sever, you suspect. You blow out your cheeks and activate your microphone.

"Greetings, honored guests." You keep the tone level but timbred, like seasoned oak. It's times like this you feel blessed by your vocal dexterity. "Welcome to our gathering. You have come far, and no doubt have many questions."

"Aren't yah gonna show yourself?" Mary-Beth. You don't let the interruption alter your pace, and you just keep talking over her.

"These questions shall be answered in good time. All shall become apparent, like one of Mr DuCane's illusions. For many of you one million dollars may seem an incredible amount. For others a trifling sum. But though you don't know each other, I assure you that your fates are entwined."

"It's a recording. Idiots." Susan's scorn is laid bare.

"I wonder where it's coming from..."

"Shh..."

"But before I make my appearance, or explain the rules of our little game, I believe dinner is in order. You have all traveled far, and our chef has prepared a magnificent spread. Retire to your rooms, and freshen up. The meal shall be served in half an hour."

You turn the microphone off. Immediately, Juanita addresses the assembled guests.

"Mr DuCane, Dr Sinclair, Ms Kelvin, your suites are in the west wing. Ms DuCane and Ms Crane, Mr and Mrs Green, your suites are in the east wing. If you will follow me..."

You smirk as the DuCanes give each other a look. The painful separation of the twins.

"Wait," Green says. "Do you know Mr Tree? Is he here yet?"

Lopez turns. "No sir," she says, all pleasant smiles and professionalism. "I was hired through an agent. I do not know where Mr Tree is, although I am sure he will reveal himself for dinner."

You turn from the monitor. Yes... dinner. But first you're going to have a little fun with the guests. They're all going to their rooms, but you saw how the DuCane's practically glared at each other. Neither would suspect if you turned up as the other at their room to talk things over.

Alternatively, you could perform a haunting: a fleeting glimpse of someone whose death the guests have caused. You stare at one of the costumes in particular: a Greek goddess of thick, curling hair and a magnificent, pointed nose. Yes... the ghost of Mia Georgallis could be an ideal first move.
1441.title: The voice of doom

145.content: Who else could it be?

1453.content:
You name was Alex Smith, an average thirteen year old boy boy of average build with short brown hair and green eyes. You were the only boy in a family of all girls since your mother and father divorced shortly after your were born. It was your birthday and, after enduring much pleading, begging and nagging from your five older sisters, you had agreed to wear a female body suit for a day...

"It's here! " Excited, Fae yelled. "The body suit is here!"

Fae was about a year older than you with honey blond hair and blue eyes. She was still in her nightgown when she ran to the living room where everyone had gathered after the delivery man dropped off the package. It wasn't very big, about the size of a garment bag with a sealed letter taped to the top. Mom opened the letter and smiled as she read the note, apparently meant for her as she had purchased the skin suit.

Perfect, it has everything I requested." Grinning, she said. She turned to you with a shark like grin. "Are you ready to become one of the girls... Alexandria?"

Your sisters giggled as you blushed profusely. "I agreed to it so... yeah." Softly, you replied. "I don't go back on my word."

Mom smiled, giving you a nod of approval. She was tall and well built with long honey blond hair and green eyes. She was dressed in simple blue jeans and white blouse. "We are going to have so much fun today, Alex." Smiling, she said. "We have a full run of activities planned for you."

"I'm sure you do..." Forcing a smile, you replied.

"You are going to love it!" Grinning, Ina said. "We and mom put a lot of thought into your new body." She giggled. "The things you are going to experience..."

Ina, Fae's twin sister, was already dressed in skinny jeans and a loose fitting blouse. You winced at her comment as she and Fae had a twisted sense of humor that had, in the past, caused you some embarrassment and grief.

"Don't spoil anything!" Grinning, Ana scolded. "It won't be much of an experience if he knows what's coming!" She then turned to you, smiling. "I can't wait to take you shopping for your new wardrobe..."

"Wait! What?!" Taken back, you demanded. "This was only supposed to be for a day! One day only..."

"You're scaring him, you airheads!" Sternly, Jess snapped. "Back off!" she then grinned. "We can easily arrange a male body suit for one or all of you to wear on your birthday coming up in a few months..."

Ina, Fae and Ana turned pale then reluctantly fell silent. Jess then turned to you. She was nearly three years older than you with long brown hair and blue eyes. She was dressed for the day in a knee length skirt and loose fitting blouse. "The deal was for you to wear a female body suit for your birthday." Calmly, she said. "However, the deal was also to experience the life of a girl. No one can properly have such an experience in a single day."

"That and the suit is far too expensive to be used for only a day." Serious, Tia said. "This is why we were very careful when we made this deal with you so to avoid too many misunderstandings." She pointed to a calendar on the wall. "The date we all circled exactly two months from today is the day you will be released from the body suit and not before unless it is an emergency."

Tia was exactly four years older than you to the date. She had honey blond hair and blue eyes and was dressed in a modest skirt and blouse. You gulped, remembering the date you had all agreed upon but it had not sunk in until now that you had agreed to wear the suit for so long. "There won't be any side effect for wearing it that long, will there?" Wincing, you asked.

Tia grinned, shaking her head. "Not other than having to learn how to act like a boy all over again." Bemused, she replied. "You will not be experiencing anything we girls do not deal with on a daily basis so we will be here to help you through it all."

"Being a teenage girl is not as easy as some young men think." Bemused, mom said. "Be ready for a few backaches as you are not used to having breasts. I will be treating you as I do all of my other daughters."

You sighed and nodded. "Let's get this body suit on then..."
1453.title: Last man standing.

choices: Your sisters help you get ready
14531.content:
You retreated to your bedroom with the bodysuit and instructions. As the only boy in the family, you were spoiled with the luxury of having your own bedroom. The rest of your sisters were jammed packed into one bedroom with bunk beds lining the walls. Your bedroom was the only place in your family's small home that you could ever retreat for privacy. You held the girl bodysuit in your hands knowing you promised to wear it. There was no backing out now.

After a few minutes of wiggling and struggling to stretch the bodysuit on, you could hear giggles and voices from the hallway. Your Mom and sisters were obviously waiting for you to emerge. You yelled to the nosy group, "Gimme a second! I'm almost done!" You held your throat in shock hearing a female voice coming out after speaking your first words.

Your sisters all burst out in laughter from the hallway hearing your voice. They pounded loudly on the door for you to unlock it. You looked down at what the bodysuit did to your form. You tugged and prodded around wondering what happened to your dick and balls. You had curvy hips just like some of your sisters now. There was no evidence of your manhood under the lifelike skin you now wore. You knew bodysuits were fully functional. The instructions had you line your penis into a tube that somehow retreated into your body. As you stretched your legs and bent over you couldn't feel your precious manhood anymore. You jiggled your chest testing out what it felt like to have modest sized breasts. The bra your mother gave you had a tag labeling they were B-cups. You slipped the rest of the clothing on she set out for you to wear. There was a pair of leggings that felt like a 3rd skin given how tight they were around your lower body. You quickly figured out these borrowed items belonged to one of your sister's outfits. It was similar to what they wore all the time.

Once dressed, you looked in the mirror. You were amazed at the family resemblance the bodysuit gave you. You were a mixture of all your sisters and had similar facial feature. There'd be no problem pulling off pretending to be a member of your family.

Your sisters continued knocking loudly on the door. You took a deep breath knowing it was time to face them. You knew they'd all joke around about your temporary appearance for the next 2 months. It was time to get it over with as you unlocked the door.

A wave of girls came rushing in carrying arm fulls of supplies. They barely acknowledged you as they ran out for more stuff. Before you knew it, your sisters were carrying dressers and bed frames into your bedroom. Your mother was the only one who took a moment to admire your new appearance. She examined your body nodding with approval, "It's great to see the bodysuit company fulfilled their guarantee. You look like my daughter and the rest of your sisters now.

"Mom?" You asked clearing your throat still adjusting to having such a high voice, "What's going on? Why are they tearing down all my posters and redecorating my room? They are even setting up bunk beds!"

Your sister Fae was busy taping a boy-band poster to the wall and answered for the group, "Now that you are a girl like the rest of us it's not fair that you get your own room anymore."

Mom nodded explaining, "She's right. If I let you keep your own room it wouldn't be fair to the rest of your sisters. Ina, Fae and Jess will be moving in with you."

You watched in amazement as your new roommates packed up all your old boy stuff into boxes and set up bunk beds. Within minutes, your bedroom suddenly seemed much smaller. Your closet was littered with girl clothes from all your sister's wardrobes. There were additional clothing racks on wheels along the side of the walls. 4 dressers and 2 bunk beds made walking space sparse in your new bedroom. You assumed your sisters would joke and make fun of you for turning into a girl. But they seemed more concerned about their new bedroom situation. You were beginning to wonder if this was their entire plan the whole time?

Jess was the oldest and sprawled out claiming a bottom bunk. The twins kept their previous set-up while Ida took the other bottom bunk. Ana got the top bunk by the window. Your only option was the empty top bunk above Jess in the dark corner. You were a bit peeved that you ended up with the worst spot. This was really your room and now it was taken over by your sisters. You stood in the narrow passage between the bunk beds complaining, "It got cramped in here fast."

Ina giggled, "If you think this is bad, try fighting for mirror space in the morning while trying to do your makeup and hair."

You were familiar with the typical morning routine at your small house. All your sisters crammed into the bathroom for hours. There were always curling irons, brushes and endless hair accessories sprawled out everywhere. You typically showered at night as a boy. Sometimes you would pee outside in the morning because you could never fend off your sisters for bathroom space. You were careful never to look in the open bathroom door in the morning. One of your sisters was usually sitting down to pee while the others did their hair. They'd always yell at you to get away. The only plus side of having a million sisters was that house was always filled with pleasant aromas. Each of them wore a different perfume and all their body washes smelled nice. You looked down and saw your new long hair dangling over your breasts and gulped knowing you'd be joining the rest of your sisters now during their morning routine.

Mom yelled down the hallway, "Come on girls. 30 minute warning!"

You were accustomed to hearing your mother's famous line hoping it would help her daughters get out of the house on time. Normally it took you 2 minutes to get ready as a boy. But now that you were one of the girls, you realized Mom was including you as her newest daughter in the warning.

You wondered what the big plans were today for your birthday? Your sisters seemed not to care you were a girl now. They were more concerned with their new bedroom situation. You were shocked to see Jess stand up and pull her top off. You turned your head out of habit seeing your sister only in a bra. You were now facing Ana who already wiggled off her leggings and tore off her panties. You were wide eyed as Ina followed suit stripping out of her clothing too. None of your sisters seemed to care about changing in front of their brother. They were obviously treating you like you were one of them now. You were in a daze looking around at 3 of your sister's bare butts and boobs dangling around while they got dressed. There were lots of exposed skin of your sisters that you'd never seen before. They had no shame changing in front of another girl.

You weren't sure what to expect when you agreed to wear a girl's bodysuit for 2 months. You mentally prepared yourself for all your sister's jokes and ridicule. However, you never imagined it would be like this. None of them seemed to care you were a girl. All they cared about was finally having more space in their bedroom.
14531.title: Getting into the body suit.

choices: First day as a girl at school
145311.content:
You were still in a daze surrounded by a sea of your nearly naked sisters. They seemed not to care that their former brother was in the room while they changed. Fae noticed you hadn't begun getting ready yet and pulled you aside. You asked her, "Where are we going?"

"To church and then to grandma's house like we do every Sunday morning for brunch. You better get a dress on. You know how mad Mom gets when us girls aren't ready to leave on time."

You gulped knowing all your sisters always wore nice dresses to church. Now that you were one of them you'd have to wear one too. You knew all your friends and family would eventually find out that you were wearing a girl suit for two months. You knew your boy cousins would joke around once they saw you. You wouldn't be able to run around outside and play sports with them for awhile. You'd have to sit with the girls and talk like all your sisters did at family gatherings. You knew you'd have to face your friends at school tomorrow like this. Ever since body suit technology had become a common purchase, it was always interesting to see one of your friends in a female form. They all mentioned how exciting it was to use the girls locker room and you couldn't wait to change for gym class tomorrow. You'd be surrounded by the hottest girls in your school and get to see them naked. You asked Fae, "What am I supposed to wear?"

Fae tells you, "You'll find out quickly that all of us sisters share clothing. You make 6 of us now who are relatively the same size and can fit into each other's stuff. Until we go shopping for your new body, you'll have to borrow our stuff. There's tons of dresses in the closet. Choose one you think is cute and find some heels that fit."

You nod staring at your closet where all your sports jerseys and guy clothes used to be. Now it's littered with dresses from your new roommates. You watch your sisters all grab a handful and begin trying them on. You follow suit and grab 5 dresses that look about your size. You learn quickly that girls like to test out different options before choosing what to wear. You follow along and slip into a few of your sister's dresses and get bored. You settle on a blue polka dot dress you remember seeing Ana wear to church before. You grabbed a pair of tights and were glad to find out you fit into a simple pair of black flats. You weren't quite ready yet to explore high heels. You'd have to practice walking around at home with them first before wearing them in public. Your mother stuck her head in your bedroom reminding, "Hurry up girls. Only 20 minutes until we leave."

20 minutes was forever in boy time. You learned fast that 20 minutes was crunch time in the girl world. You found yourself lined up along the bathroom sink fighting for mirror space. Your sisters were like vultures grabbing curling irons and brushes. You followed along and somehow managed to straighten your hair and wear it down with a few barrettes on the side. You copied Fae's choice of hairstyle but she didn't notice because she was busy doing her own. You grabbed a random perfume bottle and sprayed some on. Jewelry was being passed back and forth. You ended up with fake diamond earrings and a pearl necklace. You kept hearing the toilet flush and would look to see one of your sisters sitting down and peeing. They were used to having one bathroom and didn't think twice about relieving themselves with so many other girls in the room. Nature was calling and the toilet was finally free. You were hoping for a more private experience for your first time using the bathroom with a vagina. But now that you were one of the girls, you doubted you'd ever get alone time in the bathroom at home. You followed your sister's example and lifted up your dress while sitting down. You slid your panties to your thighs and relaxed. You were surprised at how easy it was to pee as a girl. None of your sisters seemed to even care. You assumed they'd be taunting you and making jokes. Instead, they were all happy to have more bedroom space and really didn't care that you were a girl now.
145311.title: Fitting in with your sisters

1453111.content:
You were a bit nervous for your first day at school as a girl. Your sister's had tons of uniforms and you easily found a skirt and top that fit. You always thought the girls at your school looked sexy in their uniforms and now you had to wear one too. You knew everybody at school but didn't wave or give any high fives as you walked through the halls. You felt the stares of both boys and girls wondering who the new girl was. When you went to your locker, your best friend Ricky leaned up against the wall with a smirk, "Holy shit dude? Is that really you?"

You blushed, "Yea. I promised to wear this body suit for two months. I couldn't flake out on a bet."

Ricky whistled eyeing your body up and down, "Damn buddy. Your girl-version is hot. I wish my parents had enough money to buy a body suit. I'd love to find out what having great tits like yours feel like. Although not having a dick would be really weird."

"It actually feels totally normal now. It's only when you initially put on a body suit on that it feels weird. It didn't take long getting used to not having anything between my legs. I thought it was going to be much worse."

"What about having tits? That has to be a rush to carry those babies around huh?"

"Yea. I still get a thrill every time I look down. All the women in my family were blessed with a large chest. Since this body suit copied their genes, I ended up with big ones too. They aren't very comfortable to sleep on though."

"Dude. You gotta let me see them. You'll be a good pal right? How about right after school. I'll give you a ride to football practice so I can check them out then."

You know Ricky has never been laid or had many girlfriends. You figure it won't hurt to show him your boobs, "Sure. Why not? You can even touch them if you want. You're my best friend. I'd probably want to do the same thing if our roles were reversed."

Ricky gave you a high-five, "Thanks buddy. Wait a second? What are you going to do about football? You can't play anymore as a chick." Ricky winked checking out your legs, "You'd look amazing in a cheerleader skirt now."

You blushed again at the compliment, "Thanks. I suppose I need to do something while I'm stuck as a chick for two months. I'm going to miss half of the season until I'm a guy again. Watching from the sidelines would give me the best view so I can study plays and stay on top of my game. I still gotta talk to coach about not being able to play for awhile."

"I'm so jealous. That would mean you'd get to change in the girls locker room with all the hottest chicks in school."

Ricky closed his locker and headed off to class. It gave you a view of Andrea Jones who was glaring at you. She used to go by Andrew when she was a guy. She'd been wearing a body suit since the start of last year. You were hoping to run into her today for some girl-advice. The evil look she was giving you didn't look like she was happy.

Andrea asked, "What do you think you're doing? I heard you talking to Ricky. You can't just go around showing your tits to all your friends. You'll be labeled as the school slut."

"Who cares? I'm just hooking up a buddy. It's not like I'm going to be a chick forever. I only agreed to wear this body suit for two months. I may as well hook up some of my friends with a peep show while I have a set of tits."

Andrea sighed, "That's what I thought too. When I started wearing a body suit, I was the same way. My parents got it for me as a gag present for Christmas. I wore it sometimes at home during the summer or on family vacations for a joke. Then one day I wore it to school. It was Halloween and I didn't have a costume so my Mom suggested I wear one of hers with the bodysuit. I was exactly like you and showed my boobs to all my friends that day thinking I was hooking them up. I even let some of them finger me. Since I was the only one with a body suit, my buddies talked me into wearing it on weekends sometimes. One thing led to another and soon all my buddies were screwing me on weekends when we were bored."

You nodded remembering that Andrea used to have a reputation of being a slut. She used to be on the boy's soccer team but never played much. She wore a body suit to school one day as a joke to practice with the girls. After the coach saw how good Andrea was, he offered her a starting position. She began wearing her body suit every day now that she was the star soccer player. Eventually scouts noticed and she was recruited to year round leagues. She was a shoe in for a full ride scholarship to play girls soccer and decided to keep the body suit on for good. Andrea explained, "You never know what's going to happen. I used to turn into a chick for fun. Now I'll probably always be a chick. I ruined my reputation right away and have been working to get it back ever since. I'm giving you some friendly girl-advice. Don't let your buddies take advantage of you. You say you're only wearing it for two months but if you get knocked up you won't be able to take it off for nine months."

"Knocked up?" You reply, "Is that even possible?"

"Of course it is. While you're wearing a body suit it's fully functional. I can't believe you didn't know that. It restructures your internal organs so you are 100% female until you take it off."
You had just opened your favorite snack. It was a bag of Cheetos. Before you took the first handful, Andrea knocked it away, "You can't eat that junk food as a girl. Fat goes straight to your thighs now."

You hadn't realized you'd have to watch what you eat now. You didn't want to get fat over the next few months as a girl. You had no idea body suits were so advanced. You hadn't realized you had actual girl parts inside you now, "Oh shit. Can I get a period now?"

"Once every month." Andrea nodded, "Let me know when you start feeling cramps. I'll be a pal and help you out during your first one. Putting in a tampon isn't that hard but the first time for me was a disaster. I wish I would have talked to my Mom earlier about it so she could have taught me some basic girl stuff."

You cringed knowing you'd have to deal with two menstruation cycles while you were stuck as a girl. You were glad Andrea offered advice. You would rather ask a friend than talk to your Mom about that sort of stuff. Needing to get to class, Andrea smiled, "I know what you are going through. You can talk to me anytime you have some questions."

It was nice to make a new friend. Specially one that used to be a guy.

info.brief_description: You find a website that sells bodysuits allowing you to become anyone or anything
info.description:
You come across a newly-opened website that sells bodysuits. These bodysuits, once zipped up, perfectly disguise their wearer as someone or something else entirely. The suits come in any form you could want - female, male, object and custom made, which allows a user to upload an image on which the suit is based.

The site sells a selection of accessories that augment the suits. These include:
Zip B Gone - spray on skin that causes the zipper to disappear from the suit when sprayed on, and a second spray that makes it reappear.
Neural suppressor - usually in the form of a headset, this device numbs the original persona, causes the wearer to behave perfectly like their suit.
High frequency sonicator - liquidates the flesh of anyone inside a suit. Like a caterpiller in a caccoon, the wearer's body reformed into the form of the suit.

The first 100 customers of the site receive their suits free of charge.
